task.title: Add workflow stamp after editing the MODS field in the CWRC datastream
task.shortdesc: When you make changes to the MODS form (the form you fill out when you upload an object), you will be prompted to stamp the log entry. Workflow stamps provided information about the status of the object.

step.cmd: Click on the Manage tab and select the Datastreams option.
Click on the form you would like to edit.
step.info: The form options depend on the type of object you are editing. The example below are the options for an image.

step.cmd: The Add Workflow Stamp popup appears. Add the Activity information that you would like associated with this object.
